description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This classic puzzle/platformer originally appeared on a UK Playstation magazine cover disk.  It features a time travelling snail who must use earlier versions of himself to solve some fiendish levels without bumping into himself and causing a paradox.
description.short: This classic puzzle/platformer originally appeared on a UK Playstation magazine cover disk.  It features a time travelling snail who must use earlier versions of himself to solve some fiendish levels without bumping into himself and causing a paradox.
